products.name: Classic White T-Shirt
products.description: This classic white t-shirt is a wardrobe essential. Made from 100% cotton, it is soft, comfortable, and perfect for everyday wear. The slim fit design flatters the body, while the short sleeves and crew neck provide a classic look that never goes out of style.
products.descriptionHtml: This classic white t-shirt is a wardrobe essential. Made from 100% cotton, it is soft, comfortable, and perfect for everyday wear. The slim fit design flatters the body, while the short sleeves and crew neck provide a classic look that never goes out of style.
